You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesJ J] > &jopf;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Jopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D541.
  * `&jopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D55B.
